meta.title: From UNDER to THUMB
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: This week’s Raddles are inspired by songs by the Rolling Stones. Today’s is “Under My Thumb,” which was never released as a single but appeared on their 1966 album “Aftermath.” It was this song that was being played during the deadly incident at Altamont, as depicted in the documentary film "Gimme Shelter."

ladder.clue: Change one letter in <> to get part of a cow
Change one letter in <> to ask for a pardon?
Change one letter in <> to get a container
Kind of <> given out at a restaurant
Add a letter to the start of <> to describe what some birds do
